title: Print, "King of Iris (Date-dogu), No. 50", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: "Date Thing" / (King of Iris)
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 50 / Date-dogu
description: A large iris, outer perianth leaves magenta with rays of purple tints; inner leaves red and white with purple tips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "King of Iris (Date-dogu), No. 50", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.9 cm (16 1/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-102.
